name: Inverminator
description:
Vermin... vermin everywhere. They're infesting more and more houses, and it's your job to get rid of them. Still, if you're stuck with this job, why not make the most of it? Catch the vermin plaguing your clients, and unleash them on anyone you don't like!

  • Trick pests into getting caught in your traps!
  • Explore 20 houses!
  • Six different pest types!
  • Buy spray canisters with all kinds of wacky effects!
  • Fill people's houses with even more pests!
Producer/Level Designer/3D Modeler : Brett Crowe

Website: brettcrowe.com

Character Designer/ Animator : Mattia Sicuro

Website: mattia470.wixsite.com/portfolio

3D Modeler/Environmental Artist : Sara Olivieri

Website: saraolivieri.com

Programmer : Jake McGaw

Website: kromblite.com

Music and sound : Yuri Goto
